data.author: DonPIZI

changelog.release_notes: Configuration is live! Now you can choose from 1,073,741,824 variations ;-) Change the color of the background, time, date, weekday and sunday with each of the 64 supported colors the pebble time.

data.description:
Stylish digital watchface, it displays the weekday on a different position each day.

Configuration is live! 
Now you can choose from 1,073,741,824 variations ;-) 

Change the color of the background, time, date, weekday and sunday with each of the 64 supported colors from pebble time. 

//Note: You have to refresh the watchface before the colors will change. For example switch to the menu and go back to the watchface. I am working on it :)

Low battery and no Bluetooth indicators only appear when the battery is under 20% and the connection is lost.
